title: [Rails] respond.json{ ... } with just a notice and leave page unchanged
content: [Rails] respond.json with just a notice and leave page unchanged Ruby on Rails Saturday, June 2, 2018 Hi I wanna respond.json  with just a notice that says 'You already flagged this post' and leave the page unchanged Beyond that I'd also like to know how to render whatever html partial into the calling element I wanna render Thanks in advance -- You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google Groups "Ruby on Rails: Talk" group. contentWithMarkup:
Hi I wanna respond.json { ... } with just a notice that says 'You already flagged this post' and leave the page unchanged Beyond that I'd also like to know how to render whatever html partial into the calling element I wanna render Thanks in advance

--
